skin.title: NAVER Green A형 Wiki 모바일 스킨
Wiki NAVER Green A型 移动皮肤
Wiki nGreen Line Mobile Skin
skin.description: 皮肤整体色调以灰白色为主，配上绿色边框, 显示出沉稳大方，方便用户查看wiki的内容。 NHN (developers@xpressengine.com)
The skin utilizes green as the border color, employs a concise Wiki layout style, make users easy to read wiki contents. NHN (developers@xpressengine.com)
